item.title: edgeR: DE ë¶„ì„
item.description: edgeR: DE ë¶„ì„ # #2025-07-12 Load package # library(edgeR) packageVersion("edgeR") Set path # setwd("/data/home/ysh980101/2406/data-gne") getwd() 'data/home/ysh980101/2406/data-gne' Load data, Run edgeR # tissue_type <- c("G") S1 <- "WT" S2 <- "GneKI" for (tissue in tissue_type) { print(tissue) counts <- read.csv("count.csv", header = TRUE) counts[, -1] <- lapply(counts[, -1], as.numeric) counts <- counts[rowSums(counts[, -1]) != 0, ] meta <- read.csv(paste0("mouse_meta_",tissue,".csv"), header = TRUE) meta <- meta[meta$Group %in% c(S1, S2), ] counts <- counts[, c("GeneID", unique(meta$SampleID))] counts <- counts[, colnames(counts) %in% c("GeneID", c("GeneID", unique(meta$SampleID)))] Group <- factor(meta$Group) Group <- relevel(Group, ref=S1) Group y <- DGEList(counts=counts[,2:ncol(counts)], group=Group, genes = counts[,1]) y <- calcNormFactors(y) y3 <- y design <- model.
